parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post mentions the AUR party and implicitly refers to its candidates by promoting a link to an article about Cristian Catan, an AUR candidate for the Chamber of Deputies. While not explicitly naming all candidates, the context strongly suggests an endorsement of AUR and its parliamentary candidates.  This partially fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The content is not a private message but a public statement. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's objective is to criticize the PSD-PNL-USR coalition and encourage voters to support AUR in the upcoming parliamentary elections. The call to "present themselves at the polls for a sovereign Romania" is a clear call to action for voting for AUR. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post presents opinions and criticisms, not objective reporting. While it links to an article, the post itself is not journalistic in nature. It aims to persuade, not inform objectively.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post expresses a political opinion, but it's clearly intended to influence voters towards AUR. It's not a neutral expression of personal views.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1076590570793786</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by AUR - Sălașu de Sus, promotes the AUR party and its parliamentary candidates through criticism of opposing parties and a call to vote.  The post's timing, close to the election, and its clear intention to influence voters strongly suggest it constitutes electoral propaganda. While it doesn't explicitly name all candidates, the context and linked article clearly favor AUR. The post fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) a, b, and c of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The argument against it being propaganda is weak; it's not a neutral opinion piece but a clear attempt to sway voters.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Cristian Catan</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
AUR - Sălașu de Sus, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1076590570793786) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care conține propagandă electorală pentru AUR și candidatul său Cristian Catan, criticând coaliția PSD-PNL-USR și îndemnând la vot pentru AUR. Postarea, prin tonul său și îndemnul explicit la vot, are un efect electoral clar, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea AUR.  Conținutul postării, inclusiv legătura către articolul despre Cristian Catan, demonstrează intenția de a promova AUR și candidatul său în perioada interzisă de lege.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
